Row.Text: Welcome to Republic of Turkey. My people seek the path of enlightenment, a path that will bring them great peace and prosperity. Do you search for this path as well or do you cling to dogmatic customs?
Our life is truly hellish here.
What is a fool bound by dogmatic superstitions doing in Turkey?
The world is a body composed of nations. Your nation is a cancer that must be purgued to see the world grow and prosper and my armies will be the blade that removes you.
Of course a fool like you would be envious of Turkey's accomplishments.
Change will not occur between nations unless we seek it. I offer a trade deal to benefit both our nations in the future.

You're a fool who cling to ancient lies for knowledge instead of reason. Idiots like you only impede the progress of rational nations such as mine.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Mankind is a single body and all nations are but parts of it. We must live true to these principles and seek both peace at home and peace in the world.
My men are ordered not to fight, but to die.
My people do not need your foolish superstitutions to populate their minds and control their lives. Leave your lies at the bottom of the ocean where they belong.
War is a crime and you shall be punished for it. I will order my men not just to fight, but to die until you've been defeated.
War is a crime if a nation's life is not in peril. Your exploitation of {@1_MinorCivName} is unjustified and you will not escape with impunity.
Nations cannot strive for progress in isolation. I offer you a mutual Research Agreement, so that both of our peoples can embrace the teachings of science and set aside foolish beliefs.
